events.message: I would like to request a refund for the headphones I bought last week because they do not work as expected.
The customer's request relates to a refund due to product dissatisfaction and malfunction.
The support case has been assigned to agent Emily to assist with the refund process.
Hello! I am Emily from Customer Support. I understand you'd like a refund for your headphones, and I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and describe the specific issue you encountered with the product?
My order number is 457839. The headphones have a constant buzzing sound and no clear audio comes through.
Thank you for the details. We can process a full refund upon receiving the returned item. I will send you the prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds great, thanks. I will send the headphones back today using the label you provide.
We have received your returned headphones and processed your refund. You should see the money back on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you.
Since the refund was completed and no further issues reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us!
